item.title: [Week 04] Players Projection and Matchups Simulation
item.description: Projections Individual Players Projections Simulations Pos-SNF Pre-SNF Pos-Sunday-1s-Round Pos-TNF Pre-TNF Public Fantasy Analytics Early-down offensive efficiency (whole game) for each offense during the season's first three games. Andrew Reid's team played Jacksonville and Baltimore. pic.twitter.com/tv1NytZcsB — Eric Eager üìäüèà (@PFF_Eric) September 24, 2019 Lastly, early-down defensive efficiency through three games. Down is good. If you're a Dallas fan you might be a little worried given your week 1-3 opponents, but comforted by the fact that defense doesn't win championships anymore and your offense is #good pic.
